title: Copper
shortDescription: A custom interpreted programming language created in C.
fullDescription: A foundational project exploring language design and compiler theory. Copper is an interpreted language built from scratch using C, featuring its own syntax and runtime environment.

title: RickshawHub (PHP)
shortDescription: A web-based auto rickshaw booking system built with PHP.
fullDescription: A comprehensive booking platform designed to connect passengers with auto-rickshaw drivers. It features user registration, ride booking, fare calculation, and driver management. Built using native PHP for the backend.

title: RickshawHub (Django)
shortDescription: The Python/Django implementation of the auto rickshaw booking system.
fullDescription: A robust migration of the RickshawHub concept to the Django framework. This version leverages Django's ORM and secure authentication system to provide a scalable backend for ride management.

title: SwiftRide
shortDescription: A transportation service platform built with Django.
fullDescription: A web application focused on streamlining vehicle transport services. It handles route planning, booking management, and fleet tracking using the Django framework.

title: FreshCart
shortDescription: An e-commerce grocery platform built with Django.
fullDescription: A full-featured online grocery store application. It allows users to browse products, manage carts, and process orders. Includes inventory management for administrators.

title: PetAdoption
shortDescription: A platform connecting pets with potential owners using Django.
fullDescription: A compassionate platform designed to facilitate pet adoptions. Users can browse available pets, filter by breed/type, and submit adoption applications directly through the site.

title: PathFinder
shortDescription: A navigation and route-planning application using Django.
fullDescription: A utility application for discovering paths and routes. It integrates mapping features to help users find the best way from point A to point B.

title: VoiceBot
shortDescription: A voice-activated assistant built with Django.
fullDescription: An innovative project integrating speech recognition with a Django backend. It processes voice commands to perform actions or query information, acting as a personal assistant.

title: TicTacToe Multiplayer
shortDescription: Real-time multiplayer game using Django Channels and React.
fullDescription: A modern implementation of the classic game featuring real-time WebSocket communication. It uses Django Channels for the backend and React for a responsive frontend interface.

title: QuickHire
shortDescription: A job board platform for unskilled workers built in PHP.
fullDescription: A dedicated portal bridging the gap between employers and unskilled laborers. It simplifies the hiring process with easy posting and quick application features.

title: EmailToTelegram
shortDescription: A Python automation tool forwarding emails to Telegram.
fullDescription: An efficient automation script that monitors email inboxes and forwards important messages to a Telegram chat. It utilizes IMAP for email retrieval and the Telegram Bot API.

title: Pixera
shortDescription: A website builder and content creator tool using Django.
fullDescription: A dynamic web application that allows users to create and manage simple websites or portfolios. It abstracts the coding process, providing a user-friendly interface for content creation.

title: Momentum
shortDescription: A gamified habit tracker application built with PHP.
fullDescription: A productivity tool designed to help users build and maintain positive habits. It employs gamification elements to keep users motivated and tracks progress over time.
